match_download.extractZipDescription: Extract file from archive: use right mouse button -> extract all
match_download.downloadReplayButton: Click here to download the game's replay file
match_download.placeFileTitle: Place the replay file in the game folder
match_download.createFolder: If such a folder doesn't exist, create it.
match_download.finalFile: Result: you should have the file <attention>dota/{{matchId}}.dem</attention>.
match_download.startClientTitle: Launch the client and run the console command
match_download.consoleCommandText: Console command to start viewing the replay

seo.title: Download the match replay {{matchId}}
seo.description: Download the match replay {{matchId}} played on dotaclassic.ru
